section.title: The Open Drive command
section.para: Use this command to open a physical harddrive or logical partition.

listitem.simpara: Only Harddisks are supported. CD-ROMs and Floppys are not supported (yet).
Access is read-only. Write-access is planned for a future version of Frhed.
Windows NT: You must have administrative privileges to access the physical harddisk data.
Windows 95: You must have extended interrupt 13 enabled. Read more about this here (external link).

section.title: The Close Drive command
section.para: Use this command to close the previously opened drive again.

section.title: The Goto First Sector command
section.para: Use this command to navigate to the first sector of the harddisk.

section.title: The Goto Next Sector command
section.para: Use this command to navigate to the next sector of the harddisk.

section.title: The Goto Previous Sector command
section.para: Use this command to navigate to the previous sector of the harddisk.

section.title: The Goto Last Sector command
section.para: Use this command to navigate to the last sector of the harddisk.

section.title: The Goto Sector # command
section.para: This command will show a dialog where you can specify a sector number to navigate to.
